column6:
On a lonely country road the New Warriors face what might be their greatest challenge yet... a flat tire?! Meanwhile, producer Ashley Brothers tries to convince a group of TV executives that people will actually tune in for the Warriors' adventures! Prove Ashley right by joining us for our third issue, where we ask, "How many heroes does it take...?" ,2005,8
PLUS: See behind-the-scenes footage of The Warriors' recruitment to the world of television!
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Zeb Wells | penciller (cover):Skottie Young
